name: Spare a thought for the ghostbusters
name_original: Spare a thought for the ghostbusters
description:
Ghostbusters tweak of Spare a Thought for the Little Guy - Planning to feature another 10 levels with another ending (konami style)

by Saul Cross

Publication date 2008
Topics Windows games, Vintage computer games, Action games
Spare a Thought for the Little Guy is a platform game featuring ten levels. 

 Each level (circle of hell) contains ten souls and in order to finish it you must collect them all. To make things harder, there's a bonus meter at the bottom of the screen - when you collect a soul it fills up and starts to drop. If you won't collect next soul in time - you lose a life. If you lose all lives - you start the game from the beginning.

Hit Space to jump, A and Z to climb up and down the ladder and Z to jump down from the rope.
